plugin.name: Enhanced Slug
plugin.description: Auto-generate slugs with translation or pinyin
settings.title: Enhanced Slug Settings
settings.mode.label: Generation Mode
settings.targetLanguage.label: Default Target Language
settings.targetLanguage.hint: Language code (e.g., en, es, fr, de)
settings.autoSwitch.label: Auto-switch
settings.autoSwitch.hint: Automatically switch to pinyin if all translation engines fail
settings.mappings.title: Field Mappings
settings.mappings.empty: No field mappings configured. Add mappings to automatically generate slugs for your content types.
settings.translationMode.label: Translation Mode
settings.translationMode.hint: Priority Mode: Invoke in priority order | Load Balancing: Randomly select translators for balanced usage
translator.baidu.title: Baidu Translate
translator.tencent.title: Tencent Translate
translator.alibaba.title: Alibaba Cloud Translation
translator.deepl.title: DeepL
translator.volcano.title: Volcano Engine
translator.google.title: Google Translate
translator.google.noConfig: Google Translate doesn't require API configuration
input.placeholder: Enter slug or generate from title
options.title: Configuration
options.sourceField.label: Source Field Name
options.sourceField.description: API ID of the field to generate the slug from (e.g., title).
options.advanced.required.label: Required field
options.advanced.required.description: You won't be able to create an entry if this field is empty
settings.usageMode.label: Translation Mode
settings.usageMode.hint: Priority: Call translators by priority order | Balanced: Randomly select translators for balanced usage
translator.priority.hint: Lower number means higher priority, default is 999
usage.title: Character Usage Statistics
usage.warning: Warning: This translator has reached {percentage}% of its monthly limit
